faqs.question: How do I set up lip syncing (visemes)?
faqs.answer:
[image]https://i.imgur.com/SWjhe9y.png[/image]

[info]Mouth visemes create realistic mouth movement when talking over microphone[/info]

- Generates 15 shape keys from 3 base shapes
- Uses A, OH, and CH mouth positions
- Creates realistic lip sync ready for VRChat
